exm.mng: rhinoceros horn, reputed to confer telepathic powers, fig. mutual sensitivity, tacit exchange of romantic feelings, a meeting of minds
hearts linked as one, just as the proverbial rhinoceros communicates emotion telepathically through his single horn (idiom); fig. two hearts beat as one
exm.pyn: xīn yǒu líng xī yī diǎn tōng

exm.mng: mental rapport, likeness of mind, spiritual link
(bird species of China) oriental pied hornbill (Anthracoceros albirostris)
(bird species of China) rufous-necked hornbill (Aceros nipalensis)
(bird species of China) white-throated brown hornbill (Anorrhinus austeni)
(bird species of China) wreathed hornbill (Rhyticeros undulatus)
exm.pyn: huā guān zhòu kuī xī niǎo

exm.mng: (bird species of China) great hornbill (Buceros bicornis)
